First I didn?t take him seriously but now I thing he wants to change but he can?t make his mind. May Allah Ta'ala accept your endeavours in guiding the person.

We suggest you offer an English version of the Qur'aan. We recommend the
following English translations: Muhammad Pickthall (Translation); Muhsin
Khan (Translation); Tafseer-e-Usmani (with commentary); Daryabadi (with
commentary); Maariful Qurãn (with commentary).

NB. Any translation of the Noble Qurãn must be accompanied with the Arabic
text next to the translation.
